name: Pecan Soup
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, quick, weekday, soups and stews
keywords: appetizer, main course, chipotle chilies, pecans, tomato, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 chipotle chilies in adobo, or to taste (available in most large supermarkets)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, melt butter in oil over medium heat. Add garlic, pecans and bread. Cook about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally and turning garlic and bread once, until garlic is fragrant and bread is golden.
Transfer half the pecan mixture, half the tomatoes, half the chilies and 1 1/2 cups milk to a blender. Puree until smooth. Repeat with remaining pecan mixture, tomatoes, chilies and 1 1/2 cups milk.
Pour mixture back into pot, along with remaining milk, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then simmer about 3 minutes. Serve hot, garnishing each bowl with a pecan half.
